question: You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Make sure the code you generate is executable for demonstration. Help me write a WeChat Mini Program for selling clothes. Requirement: Make it similar to the popular milk tea ordering Mini Program "Bawang Chaji".

checklist.title: Is the clothing e-commerce core functionality well implemented?
checklist.description: Review whether the code accurately implements essential e-commerce features: product listing, category filtering, item detail pages, shopping cart, and checkout process. Score 0 if core shopping flow is absent, 5 if basic functionality exists but lacks refinement, and 10 if the implementation is complete with smooth transitions between screens.

checklist.title: Does the Mini Program implement a proper user authentication system?
checklist.description: Check whether the code utilizes WeChat's authentication APIs correctly, includes user profile management, and securely handles user session. Deduct 5 points if login functionality is missing, 3 points if user profile management is incomplete, and 2 points if session handling is insecure. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the product customization functionality similar to 'Bawang Chaji' implemented?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code implements clothing customization options (size selection, color variants, style options) similar to how 'Bawang Chaji' allows beverage customization. Deduct 5 points if customization is absent, 3 points if options cannot be combined, and 2 points if user selections aren't visually reflected. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the Mini Program implement proper state management and data synchronization?
checklist.description: Check whether the code uses appropriate state management solutions (like Mobx, Redux patterns in WXML context), maintains consistency across pages, and properly synchronizes with backend services. Deduct 5 points for global state issues, 3 points for inconsistent data across pages, and 5 points if offline capability is missing. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code handles common edge cases (network failures, payment failures, item out-of-stock situations) and provides user-friendly error messages. Code with strong error handling should recover gracefully from errors, giving 10 points. If error handling is average, give 5 points, and if exceptions are unhandled, give 0 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the shopping experience (e.g., 1. AR virtual try-on 2. Social sharing with discount incentives 3. Personalized outfit recommendations). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Duplicate functionality across different pages 2. Features unrelated to clothing e-commerce (e.g., built-in games not tied to purchasing) 3. Excessive animations that affect performance on lower-end devices. Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core shopping experience is compromised by bloat.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (separation of UI components, business logic, and API services), component reusability, and WeChat Mini Program best practices. Deduct 5 points if global app instance is overused; deduct 5 points for excessive duplicate WXML/WXSS; deduct 5 points if file structure is chaotic or custom components are not properly utilized. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the design follows WeChat Mini Program design principles: 1) Consistent with WeChat's visual language 2) Proper use of white space (following 8px grid system) 3) Typography hierarchy (at least 3 distinct text styles for different content types). Deduct 3 points for each inconsistent UI element, 5 points for poor readability due to contrast issues, and 5 points for layouts that don't adapt to different device sizes. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the dynamic interaction smooth and seamless?
checklist.description: Judge whether interactions follow WeChat Mini Program conventions: 1) Page transitions complete within 300ms 2) Skeleton screens during data loading 3) Appropriate haptic feedback for important actions. Deduct 5 points for each interaction without loading state, 3 points for jerky animations, and 5 points for confusing navigation patterns. The full score is 10 points.
